body_html:
@chhwang the ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH is not set correctly.Please modify docker file and test as follows：

...
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}"  
...

And you can add bazel build argument --verbose_failures to check LD_LIBRARY_PATH like this:

bazel build ... --verbose_failures

body:
@chhwang the ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH is not set correctly.Please modify docker file and test as follows：
```
...
ENV LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}"  
...
```
And you can add bazel build argument `--verbose_failures` to check LD_LIBRARY_PATH like this:
```
bazel build ... --verbose_failures
```
